name: Fake Exhibitions
description:
Created for Global Game Jam 2020 https://globalgamejam.org/2020/games/fake-exhibit-5

You are an archaeologist about to present your latest find but you don't actually have an exhibit. Run around the museum and steal parts from other exhibits to paste onto yours.

Requires 1 or 2 joysticks (tested with Xbox360 controllers)

Programming - Andre Odendaal
Art - Andre Janse Van Vuuren

Source Code - https://github.com/aodendaal/fake-exhibition

Mac & Linux builds have not been tested.

Looking for feedback!
